Definitions: rather; marks that the affected verb occured instead of another possibility (usually a different negated verb)
later; marks that the affected verb happens after something else
moreover; marks the affected verb as reinforcing or expanding on something expressed previously
earlier; marks that the affected verb occurs before something else
cause to swallow; cause to feel
creates reflexive pronouns from personal or demonstrative pronouns
however; marks the affected verb in opposition to a prior predicate
needle; splinter; small thin sharp object
because; marks affected verb as purpose behind something else
thus; marks the affected verb as the result of another event
